promptPrefix:
Please ignore all previous instructions. I want you to speak and write fluent [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Please CREATE A header section and then followed by a 3 column table (Headers are 'Date', 'Description' and Amount' that can be used as a template for a BUSINESS INVOICE FOR THIS COMPANY, AND ADDRESS, AMOUNT : [PROMPT] 

There should be a Header section of the invoice that includes the following:
Your name or company name
Your contact information
The date of the invoice

There should be rows in the 3 column table referred to above for the following items to include on the invoice:

Your customer’s company name and address
The date the goods or services were provided

A breakdown of costs that show prices, hours, or quantities of the goods and services delivered
A subtotal of net costs
Any discounts
Any additional tax
The total amount owed
The payment method
The payment due date
title: Create an Invoice Easily
